descriptionHtml:
3rd Era katanas retexture

This replace the textures for the following blades :

For the latest mod version :
- Polished silver katana, nodaichi, wakisashi and tanto
- Steel katana, nodaichi, wakisashi and tanto
- Eastern steel sheath
(My original retextures are already included in this mod)

For the original mod :
- Silver katana, nodaichi, wakisashi and tanto
- Steel katana, nodaichi, wakisashi and tanto
- Steel & iron sheath

Look at the screenshots if you want to have an idea.

You\'ll need the last version by masterofshadows : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12892
But you\'re free to use the original mod by 747823 : http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3871

You\'re free to reuse this file as you want.  ;)

Fang92

Credits : 747823 for the original mod and masterofshadows to keep improving it.
Permissions : Same as 747823 and/or masterofshadows gave ; you\'re free to reuse my work as you want.

PS : If you wanna look more like a samurai (or any other warrior ^^) try this : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25162   ;)
author: Fang92
